summary: Two friends win a journey on a cruise ship with their favorite TV-show-master. When he surprisingly dies they try to cover up his death to find the murderer.
cast: John Friedmann|Florian Simbeck|Ludger Pistor|Andrea Sawatzki|Michael Schiller|Thorsten Feller|Arzu Bazman|Julia Dietze|Michael Schwarzmaier|Henny Reents|Christoph Maria Herbst|Daniel Krauss|Sandrine Mittelstädt|Daniela Eck|Michael Gahr|Ulla Geiger|Monika Manz|Philipp Gaul|Manfred Körber|Eva Körber|Astrid Polak|Stefan Lehnen|Suse Schulte Mäter|Katinka Kaltenborn|Zoya Douchine|Anja Hofmann|Kim Oliver Gregan|Arne Elsholtz|Mathias Lösel|Michael Karen|Carmen Ach|Peter Bosch|Sebastian Bulst|Alex Gottschalk|Markus Kreft|Susanne Frommert
title: Erkan & Stefan in Der Tod kommt krass
